channel.title: Music – Conway Twitty

item.title: Conway Twitty - Lonely Blue Boy
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 8552

My name
should be trouble
My name
should be woe
For trouble
and heartache
Is all that
I know yeah
Lonely lonely blue boy
is my name
My life
have been empty
My heart
has been torn
It must
have been raining
The night
I was born yeah
A lonely
lonely blue boy
Is my name
well I’m so
I’m so afraid
of tomorrow
And so tired
so tired of today
They say that love
is the answer
But love never came
my way
I’m writing
this letter
To someone unknown
so if you should
Find it
and if you’re alone
Oh well a lonely
lonely blue boy
Is my name
remember a lonely
Lonely blue boy
is my name-
